about_the_game:
Obilia is a casual episodic open-world RPG, an open-ended odyssey in a vibrant archipelago tailored for you.

Following widespread societal collapse, Vigor Pike, visionary founder of Legacy, envisions a fresh start. With his friend Kai Hudson, they unveil Obilia – a beacon of hope and rediscovery. As a latest generation Legacy envoy, you'll step onto a world of possibilities, adventures and secrets, and find where you belong in the Obilia's rich, evolving tapestry. Your journey will lead you far and wide – from the presence of a philosopher in a city of wisdom to the vengeful rage of a demonic god, or discovering the extraordinary fauna, unearthing ancient songs lost to history, and navigating through environments rich in forgotten lore. From lush forests to misty mountains, serene waters to dreamy caves, each island will offer its unique adventures and challenges. Obilia warmly invites you to weave your own story where you will never run out of things to do.

Welcome Home, Future Obilian

In your travels across this new habitat without end, you'll uncover both new and familiar landscapes, you'll assist and befriend companions, solve puzzles, confront foes, and engage in cooking, crafting, fishing, and more. As you gain the trust of the inhabitants, you'll uncover what it means to be an Obilian.

You Lead the Journey

Choose how you want to explore and experience Obilia – fish in ever-changing waters, cook unique dishes, cultivate crops from your travels. Craft yourself tools and weapons, build a home filled with artifacts from your adventures, and explore the richly-varied regions of Obilia, where puzzles and quest unlock secrets and rare treasures.

An Ever-Unfolding Odyssey

Rediscover humanity's legacy in Obilia, built away from the remains of a world in disorder, a place to remember humanity, reenact history, and reshape a future. Interact with colorful and enigmatic inhabitants, each with their own rich histories and secrets. Find companions to progress your story and expand your world. Master your skills in fishing, crafting and puzzle-solving, earn the trust of the community, and uncover the depths of Obilia.

Craft Your Personal Paradise

Turn your personal island in Obilia into a reflection of your journey! With limitless customization options, you can cultivate your own land, build and decorate the home of your dreams. Whether it's a Victorian cottage, a Viking longhouse, or a simple thatched hut, your island will be the canvas for your imagination. Expand it, blend styles, and create a space that represents the unique Obilian you are.

short_description: Embark on a journey in Obilia, an archipelago of tomorrow dedicated to humanity's legacy and imagination. Explore this evolving world, get to know its legendary figures, and find your own place in this expansive open-world RPG.
